means: 福克纳（姓氏； William, 1897-1962，美国小说家，曾获1949年诺贝尔文学奖）

sentence.Network_en: Faulkner has been hailed as the greatest American novelist of his generation.
sentence.Network_cn: 福克纳被誉为他那一代人中最伟大的美国小说家。

sentence.Network_en: A colleague urged him to see a psychiatrist, but Faulkner refused.
sentence.Network_cn: 一位同事竭力劝福克纳去看精神病医生，但他拒绝了。

sentence.Network_en: Waiting to hear from you, Yours sincerely, William Faulkner.
sentence.Network_cn: 盼复，您的诚挚的，威廉·福克纳

PerfectNetExp.abs: 用福克纳（Faulkner）的话来说就是，女人不止是勉强地活着，她们很成功。这就使得她们不像她们的丈夫或情人，她们更容易应对 …
经典英文名句... ... ------Roosevelt- -----罗斯福 ------Faulkner- -----佛克纳 ------Marie Winn,- -----温恩,〈观赏对阅读〉.

list.abs: 关于文章 ……诸位有什麽好建议？ ... Tender is the Night 夜色温柔 • William Faulkner 威廉•福克纳 As I Lay Dying 我弥留之际.
犯罪心理-名言_赫秾_新浪博客 ... ——Einstein 爱因斯坦 ——William Faulkner 威廉姆斯·福克纳（美国作家）.

means.word_mean: 1. United States novelist (originally Falkner) who wrote about people in the southern United States (1897-1962)
